description: A small but fierce dragon, the Wyrmling Ashblood is covered in dark, ash-like scales that seem to smolder with internal heat. It is known for its fiery breath and quick, unpredictable movements.

traits.name: Heated Body
traits.description: A creature that touches the Wyrmling Ashblood or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The Wyrmling exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
